QuestData.Title: Leaders Among Breeders
QuestData.Description: Before any kegs are tapped, we have work to do. These virmen are no different than the virmen on the Wandering Isle... a nuisance that breeds as fast as the rabbits they resemble.$b$bSure, we could kill every last virmen we find, but what's the point in needless bloodshed? Let's just take out their alphas, and they'll slow down with their... reproduction.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Aiyu the Skillet, Jinanya the Clawblade, and Frenzyhop.
QuestData.CompletionText: The virmen here have strange habits. Stranger names.
QuestData.RewardText: <Chen nods.>$b$bGood work, $n. You're not bad in combat.$b$bWhat do you say we team up for the next part?
